name: BCommissionComponent
desc: Commission which shows and gets commission's definitions.

infoArray.name: visibilityPaymentInformation
infoArray.desc: If true, the payment info will automatically visible.

infoArray.name: visibilityPaymentInformationOptions
infoArray.desc: If true, the payment info options will automatically visible.

infoArray.name: isSafeOptionChecked
infoArray.desc: If true, the Safe Option will automatically be checked and then Account Option will be unchecked.

infoArray.name: isAccountOptionChecked
infoArray.desc: If true, the Account Option will automatically be checked and then Safe Option will be unchecked.

infoArray.name: commissionSerializeId
infoArray.desc: To get commission info from serialize table

infoArray.name: commissionJournalBusinessKey
infoArray.desc: To get commission info from journal table

infoArray.name: onLoadCompleted
infoArray.desc: Callback function fires when the component load

infoArray.name: onCommissionAmountChanged
infoArray.desc: Callback function fires when the commission amount changed

infoArray.name: afterSelectedFECChanged
infoArray.desc: Callback function fires when the commission amount changed

infoArray.name: afterCommissionInfoLoaded
infoArray.desc: Callback function fires when the commission info loaded

infoArray.name: onPaymentInformationOptionsChanged
infoArray.desc: Callback function fires when the payment information options changed
